messages.content: William Reed works with Jerry Ruiz.
Jerry Ruiz is a colleague of Joseph Mitchell.
Joseph Mitchell works with Joan Russell.
Joan Russell is a colleague of Janice Garcia.
Janice Garcia works with Wayne Owens.
Wayne Owens is a colleague of Ronald Simmons.
Ronald Simmons works with Betty Mitchell.
Betty Mitchell is a colleague of Jose Marshall.
Jose Marshall works with Samuel Young.
Samuel Young is a colleague of Jean Reynolds.

queries.question: Are William Reed and Jean Reynolds related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
